description: Graduated Cum Laude. Took a variety of classes including machine learning, operating systems and distributed systems. Minored in entrepreneurship. Was president of CSE Scholars, and hosted a veriety of workshops and tech talks from students and industry professionals.

Specialized in strategy, finance, and global business. Graduated with Distinction and Beta Gamma Sigma honors, 3x Dean's list, and recepient for the Reuben and Jane Leibowitz Scholarship. Block leader for my cohort, organizing events and activities to foster community among students.
Global Experiential Learning via NYU Stern. Focus on business in Australia and the Asia-Pacific region.
Global Experiential Learning via NYU Stern. Focus on entreprenueurship and innovation in Europe.
